sentences.sContent: A massive arms-smuggling plan has been foiled by the CIA.
sentences.sCn: 一项大规模的军火走私计划已被中央情报局挫败。

synos.tran: 衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于
[材]箔，金属薄片；衬托，烘托；[建]叶形片

phrases.pCn: 铝箔（作包装材料）；锡箔纸
箔纸，贴铝箔的纸基；衬底纸

remMethod.val: 在金属片 (foil) 上涂抹油 (oil) 以减少摩擦

words.tran: 阻止（foil的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于
trans.tranOther: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do

trans.tranCn: 箔，金属薄片；衬托，烘托；叶形片
trans.tranOther: metal sheets that are as thin as paper, used for wrapping food

trans.tranCn: 面向文件的翻译语言（file-Oriented interpretive language）
